data.INTRO4_LBL: Transmit your optimism by writing remarkable success stories
data.LATEST_DESCRIPTION: HeadUP is your Social Storytelling Network, a problem-and-solution website where you can transmit your optimism, tell how you keep or kept your head up. Share positive and fun experiences, write personal achievements or read remarkable success stories. Tell the world about a solution you found to a challenging situation or a difficulty you once faced. Speak up, HeadUP

data.LP_HOME_INTRO_LBL: “A good vibe a day goes a long way”
data.LP_PRODUCT_ITEM_04_DESC: Promote your projects, your business, your talents
data.HOME_DESCRIPTION: HeadUP is a Social Storytelling Network, where you can write and read stories from all over the world, talk about your projects, your events, your content, your business, transmit your optimism and tell how you keep your head up. Share personal experiences and achievements, read remarkable success stories, discover interesting content, add visibility to your work, display your creativity, etc
